properties.areaDesc: Butler, KY; Muhlenberg, KY; Ohio, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 4:39AM EST until February 10 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Woodbury

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Butler...Warren.

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Rochester

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Butler...Muhlenberg...
Ohio.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Rochester.
* until Monday morning.
* At  6:00 AM Saturday the stage was 18.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 17.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is likely near crest now and will then fall to below flood stage after midnight Monday.
* Impact...At 17.0 feet...Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed.
KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.9
feet on May 12 2009.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
